name: WEC Energy Group, Inc.
description: WEC Energy Group, Inc. is a leading energy company based in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, that provides electric and natural gas service to millions of customers across the Midwest. Established in 1896, the company has evolved through strategic mergers and acquisitions, becoming a key player in the utility sector. WEC Energy Group operates through its subsidiaries, including Wisconsin Electric Power Company, Wisconsin Gas LLC, and Peoples Gas. The company is committed to delivering safe, reliable, and affordable energy while focusing on sustainability and reducing its carbon footprint. WEC Energy Group is actively investing in renewable energy projects, such as wind and solar, and has set ambitious goals to achieve net-zero carbon emissions by 2050. The company’s diversified energy portfolio includes traditional fossil fuels, as well as a growing emphasis on cleaner energy sources to meet the needs of its customers and contribute to a sustainable future. With a strong focus on community engagement, WEC Energy Group also supports various initiatives aimed at enhancing the quality of life in the regions it serves.

key_executives.name: Dawn R. B. S. W. Kelsey

seo.meta_title: WEC Energy Group, Inc. | Leading Energy Provider
seo.meta_description: Explore WEC Energy Group, Inc., a premier provider of electric and natural gas services in the Midwest, committed to sustainability and renewable energy.

faq.question: What services does WEC Energy Group provide?
faq.answer: WEC Energy Group provides electric and natural gas services to residential, commercial, and industrial customers.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of WEC Energy Group?
faq.answer: Kurt J. W. H. Kittner is the CEO of WEC Energy Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is WEC Energy Group headquartered?
faq.answer: WEC Energy Group is headquartered in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, USA.

faq.question: What is WEC Energy Group's commitment to sustainability?
faq.answer: WEC Energy Group is committed to achieving net-zero carbon emissions by 2050 and is investing in renewable energy sources.

faq.question: When was WEC Energy Group founded?
faq.answer: WEC Energy Group was founded in 1896.
